title: Why are chartered accounts important? - Quora

response.answer_text: The simple answer, because we examine the financials of a company and give an opinion. Our opinion directly effects the stakeholders or wanna be stakeholders of the company. Apart from that there are various services that we offer to the society, but the basic and foremost being the Auditing services. Just imagine, you have loads of money and you would like to invest in such company, which can give you good returns. What do you do, read the financials, study about the company. But have you ever thought, the data that you are going through, whether is it reliable or not ? That's were a CA steps in. He uses his professional judgement, skepticism and *tries* to ensure that whatever data company is releasing, is not fraudulent. And they rightly say, CA's are the backbone of an Economy. Thank You CA Rupesh Jain
